title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the truth about reality and fights AI.

title: Inception
description: A thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of astronauts travels through a wormhole to save humanity.

title: Avatar
description: A marine explores an alien world and bonds with natives.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.
